summary: This is an email forwarding a potential witness tip regarding Jeffrey Epstein. An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is passing along contact information for an individual who claims to have information about Epstein to FBI personnel for addition to a spreadsheet and follow-up.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the forwarding email, passing along a potential witness tip about Epstein to the FBI.

events.title: Potential Witness Tip Received
events.description: An individual contacted the U.S. Attorney's office claiming to have information about Jeffrey Epstein. The tip was forwarded to the FBI for follow-up.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: A potential witness contacted the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York claiming to have information about Jeffrey Epstein on July 9, 2019.
The tip was forwarded to the FBI for addition to an FBI spreadsheet and follow-up investigation.
The document indicates an active witness outreach and information-gathering process by authorities regarding Epstein in July 2019.
